title: Virat Kohli’s lunch with lady love Anushka Sharma and her father
text: Virat Kohli’s lunch with lady love Anushka Sharma and her father Saturday, 24 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) Virat Kohli went on a lunch date with his lady love, Bollywood actress Anushka Sharma, along with her father, on October 23 in Mumbai.
